channel.title: [PI] How to Downpower items
channel.description:
Hello i have [PI] Source Ihybrid.
I've searched www.google.com
www.bing.com
and Our search bar for some answears
Not 1 person has actually posted how you can edit the bonuses and stats of an item.
So can any1 body give me a clue or maybe even spoon-feed me ;p, i only want to do 2 things
1: Power up D claws - It's really weak
1: Downpower Dds - It's strong as fuck.
If any1 can please help me, it'd be greatly appreciated ! thanks!

item.title: [PI] How to Downpower items
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

It’s quite obvious how you do this, look in the tutorials section.

Read full topic
